ai.grakn.graql

Interface MatchQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Map<String,Concept>>, Query<List<Map<String,Concept>>>, Streamable<Map<String,Concept>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MatchQueryAdmin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MatchQueryBase

    public interface MatchQuery
extends Query<List<Map<String,Concept>>>, Streamable<Map<String,Concept>>
    a query used for finding data in a graph that matches the given patterns.

    The MatchQuery is a pattern-matching query. The patterns are described in a declarative fashion, forming a subgraph, then the MatchQuery will traverse the graph in an efficient fashion to find any matching subgraphs.

    Each matching subgraph will produce a map, where keys are variable names and values are concepts in the graph.

    Author:
    Felix Chapman
